message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, Bob, I'll give you a little more. But let's try to be reasonable here. We don't want to lose everything!
I'll give you a bit more than last time, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
Bob, let's be smart. We're losing money with each round. Splitting evenly is the best way to make sure we both get something.
